3: It has been a long time since Alpha forced in a connection.
Through the quantitative control of the Punishing Virus in your body, we can basically determine...
That person uses a means of signal transmission that carries out signal relay through the Punishing Virus.
I don't know how they managed to emulate Gray Raven's Inver-Device signal to reverse-interfere with your Mind Beacon…
But at least, we've managed to filter out and cut off most of those signals.
In short, you're out of prison.
I heard that you're finally unbound from that signal.
Great, let us go back to the front then.
Finally able to bathe in the blue skies and sunshine with Lucia again... Yet suddenly, something oddly familiar buzzes...
